Text: Dear Mr Lay I dont know much about the vast world of business and im not extremely knowledgeable about the happenings within the corporation but I do know about perseverance I understand that you made Enron the powerhouse that it is through perseverance and no matter how difficult things are right now Enron will return to the top I respect you a great deal as a businessman and I know that you will find a way to bring the company out of these times Good Luck
